feed.title: Vet Data Hub Docs & Support
feed.subtitle: This is the documentation and supports page for the Vet Data Hub project by Songa Labs.

entry.title: Introduction to the Vet Data Hub

link.title: Introduction to the Vet Data Hub

entry.content:
Registration

Registration is easy and straight forward and is initiated by selecting the Register option on the welcome screen show below.

Account creation

The next screen will be cater for account creation as shown below

Fill the fields with appropriate information and select submit.

Login

Next you will be directed to the log in page where you will log in using the credentials previously created.

Profile

Next you will be directed to your profile page where you will find a form to submit your profile details that will be used by the system in all processes performed in the data hub.
